name: BAY FRONT REAL ESTATE COMPANY v. CITY OF NEWPORT
name_abbreviation: Bay Front Real Estate Co. v. City of Newport

parties: BAY FRONT REAL ESTATE COMPANY v. CITY OF NEWPORT.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The plaintiff’s motion to dismiss defendant’s appeal as moot is granted.

attorneys: Michael P. | DeFanti, Providence, for plaintiff.
Turner C. Scott, Newport, for defendant.
casebody.head_matter:
BAY FRONT REAL ESTATE COMPANY v. CITY OF NEWPORT.
No. 84-28-A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
May 31, 1984.
Michael P. | DeFanti, Providence, for plaintiff.
Turner C. Scott, Newport, for defendant.
